data.text: Ao Onyankopɔn, woapo yɛn, woabɔ yɛagu;
Woawoso asase no na woapae mu;
Woama wo nkurɔfoɔ ahunu mmerɛ bɔne;
Nanso wɔn a wɔsuro wo deɛ, woama wɔn frankaa so
Gye yɛn nkwa na fa wo nsa nifa boa yɛn,
Gilead wɔ me, Manase wɔ me;
Hwan na ɔde me bɛkɔ kuropɔn a wɔabɔ ho ban no mu?
Ɛnyɛ wo, Ao Onyankopɔn, wo a woapo yɛn
Onyankopɔn wɔ yɛn afa yi, yɛbɛdi nkonim,
